title: Eat. Shop. Repeat. Discover how fun life can be at Maplewood!💥
posting_body: This charming Mountain View apartment community is centrally located amongst the top Silicon Valley companies and makes the perfect home for the techie.
Select a home from an array of generously sized studios and two bedroom floor plans.
All feature contemporary kitchens with designer fixtures, built-in microwave and dishwasher, ceiling fans, air conditioning and plenty of linen and closet space.
Outside, go for a swim in the sparkling swimming pool or relax in our beautifully landscaped grounds.
Living: All Common Areas Are Non-Smoking
-Minutes to Downtown Mountain View Dining, Shops & Entertainment
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
*Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
